ProjectTitle: THE ENVIRONMENTAL CRIMES AND HARMS BEHIND PANDEMICS  A green criminological exploration of wildlife trafficking, farms and markets in Vietnam
InitialFeedbackHistory:
12/07/2023
We are aware that this research project will start later. When it does start at KU Leuven, please develop the data management plan using the Flemish Standard Data Management Plan template that FWO requires. 
See guidance here: DMP Guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp

The current plan certainly already contains much valuable information, but some key topics are missing. For example, which data documentation will be developed,and how data will be preserved and shared. The template contains questions that help you provide this information. Also guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
